text: Shmuel Agmon () (2 February 1922 - March 2025) was an Israeli mathematician. He was known for his work in analysis and partial differential equations. He was born in Tel-Aviv, Israel. Agmon died in March 2025 at the age of 103. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Israeli Jewish scientists Category:Israeli mathematicians Category:Scientists from Tel Aviv Category:Hebrew University of Jerusalem faculty
title: Shmuel Agmon
